# What is OGW certification?

**OGW certification** means that a groundwater elevation database adheres to the [OGW data schema](data-schema.html) and has been certified by our automated, [online certification system](#). Certification only takes a few minutes, and is as easy as uploading a sample of your data and downloading a certificate. 

*<gif of a online screen capture showing a user dropping data into a Shiny App, obtaining a success message, and downloading the certificate>*

# Why certify?

Once your data has been certified you can be assured it is:

<i class="fas fa-check" style = "color:#50C878"></i> [Interoperable between basins](interbasin.html)  
<i class="fas fa-check" style = "color:#50C878"></i> [Compliant with XXX annual reporting](reporting.html)  
<i class="fas fa-check" style = "color:#50C878"></i> Eligible for potential [express reporting to XXX](iot.html)
